participant_1.background:

I put on my uniform and got ready to protect my city.
I wear contacts now.
i played football in high school.
I don't like to talk about my favorite food.

participant_2.background:
I collect music and other things that represent my personality and interests.
My parents were immigrants from Italy.
I run every day because I want to be healthy and set a good example for my younger sibling.
My family is very supportive of my career and loves that I get to be creative everyday.
i work full time.

content.text: I just got home from work and I'm ready to relax.
I'm about to go for a run. Do you like to run?
I used to play football in high school, but I don't run much anymore.
I run every day because I want to be healthy and set a good example for my younger sibling.
That's great! I'm sure your sibling is really proud of you.
They are! I'm lucky to have such a supportive family.
My family is also very supportive. I'm grateful to have them in my life.
What do your parents do for a living?
My mom is a teacher and my dad is a doctor.
That's great! My parents were immigrants from Italy.
Oh, that's interesting! Do you speak Italian?
A little bit. I'm not fluent, but I can understand it.
That's cool! I've always wanted to learn a new language.
It's definitely worth it! It's a lot of fun and it can open up a lot of new opportunities.
I'll have to look into it. Thanks for the suggestion
